key.name: connection_id
key.description: Connection id, which is the registered name of the created global BrokerConnection-utility.

key.name: hostname
key.description: Hostname or IP Address to connect to, default to localhost.

key.name: port
key.description: TCP port to connecto, defaults to 5672.

key.name: virtual_host
key.description: RabbitMQ virtual host to use, defaults to /.

key.name: username
key.description: Plain text username, defaults to guest.

key.name: password
key.description: Plain text password, defaults to guest.

key.name: heartbeat
key.description: AMQP heartbeat interval in seconds, defaults to 0 to disable heartbeat.

key.name: tx_select
key.description: Use transactional AMQP channels, defaults to off.

key.name: keepalive
key.description: Register producer, consumer, view and clock-server with the given integer timeout in seconds to keep the connection alive.

key.name: producer
key.description: Register a default producer for this connection (a producer with no specific routing, with the name of the connection), defaults to on.

key.name: connection_id
key.description: The name of a global utility providing configured IBrokerConnection. A consuming server will serve consumers registered for its connection id only.

key.name: site_id
key.description: The id of a site, which should be the context when consuming the AMQP messages, which the consumers of a consuming server consume.

key.name: user_id
key.description: Optional user id of the user, whose privileges are used to consume the messages. By default, the messages are consumed as Anonymous User calling trusted filesystem code.
